name: Schematics, Please
description:
Play as an engineer, tasked with keeping your Mech pilots from creating incoherent monstrosities. Mix and match parts to meet mission criteria and try not to kill too many pilots...

Try and see if you can last at least 7 years (in-game), with each year adding more and more responsibilities! Year 8+ is just free play, see how far you can make it!

Credits:
